game_id.description: Unique identifier for the game session.

current_day.description: The current day within the loop.

your_hand.description: The hand of the player receiving this view.

your_deductions.description: The deduction state of the player receiving this view.

PlayerView.title: Player View
PlayerView.description: PlayerView is a tailored, client-facing representation of the game state for a specific player. It includes only the information that the player is permitted to see, hiding sensitive data.

used_this_loop.description: Whether the ability has been used in the current loop.

owner_character_id.description: The ID of the character that owns the ability.

tragedylooper.v1.Ability.title: Ability
tragedylooper.v1.Ability.description: Ability defines a character's ability at runtime.

id.description: The unique identifier for the ability.

trigger_type.title: Trigger Type
trigger_type.description: 触发器类型（能力或规则何时触发）

event_filters.title: Game Event Type
event_filters.description: 游戏事件类型（用于能力触发器过滤）

once_per_loop.description: Whether the ability can only be used once per loop.

is_mandatory.description: Whether the ability is mandatory (cannot be refused).

priority.description: The priority of the ability's resolution.

conditions.description: A list of conditions that must be met to use the ability.

requires_choice.description: Whether the ability requires a choice to be made.

tragedylooper.v1.AbilityConfig.title: Ability Config
tragedylooper.v1.AbilityConfig.description: AbilityConfig defines the configuration for a character's ability.

tragedylooper.v1.AddTraitEffect.title: Add Trait Effect
tragedylooper.v1.AddTraitEffect.description: AddTraitEffect defines an effect that adds a trait to a character.

stat_type.title: Stat Type
stat_type.description: StatType defines the type of character stat.

amount.description: The amount to adjust the stat by (positive for increase, negative for decrease).

tragedylooper.v1.AdjustStatEffect.title: Adjust Stat Effect
tragedylooper.v1.AdjustStatEffect.description: AdjustStatEffect defines an effect that adjusts a character's stat.

id.description: The unique ID of the card, copied from its config for convenience.

config.description: The static configuration of the card.

used_this_loop.description: Whether the card has been used in the current loop.

resolved_target.description: The final, confirmed target for the card's effect, set after any required player choices.

tragedylooper.v1.Card.title: Card
tragedylooper.v1.Card.description: Card represents an instance of a card in a player's hand or in play. It combines the static configuration with dynamic, mutable state.

id.description: The unique identifier for this type of card.

description.description: A user-facing description of the card's effect.

effect.description: The effect or chain of effects the card produces when played.

once_per_loop.description: If true, this card can only be successfully played once per loop.

priority.description: The priority of the card, used to determine resolution order among cards of the same type.

tragedylooper.v1.CardConfig.title: Card Config
tragedylooper.v1.CardConfig.description: CardConfig defines the static, immutable properties of a card. This represents a card as it is defined in the game's rulebook or script.

tragedylooper.v1.ChangeRoleEffect.title: Change Role Effect
tragedylooper.v1.ChangeRoleEffect.description: ChangeRoleEffect defines an effect that changes a character's role.

trigger.title: Trigger Type
trigger.description: 触发器类型（能力或规则何时触发）

tragedylooper.v1.CharacterRule.title: Character Rule
tragedylooper.v1.CharacterRule.description: CharacterRule defines a special rule for a character.

location.title: Location Type
location.description: 地点类型（也可通过LocationConfig扩展）

effect_option_index.description: 用于复合效果中的效果选择

tragedylooper.v1.Choice.title: Choice
tragedylooper.v1.Choice.description: Choice 表示玩家可以做出的选择。

operator.title: Operator
operator.description: The operator to use when combining conditions.

tragedylooper.v1.CompoundCondition.title: Compound Condition
tragedylooper.v1.CompoundCondition.description: CompoundCondition defines a combination of multiple conditions.

operator.title: Operator
operator.description: The operator to use when combining effects.

tragedylooper.v1.CompoundEffect.title: Compound Effect
tragedylooper.v1.CompoundEffect.description: CompoundEffect defines a combination of multiple effects.

tragedylooper.v1.Condition.title: Condition
tragedylooper.v1.Condition.description: Condition defines a condition for triggering rules, events, and effects.

then_effect.description: The effect to execute if the condition is true.

else_effect.description: Optional: The effect to execute if the condition is false.

tragedylooper.v1.ConditionalEffect.title: Conditional Effect
tragedylooper.v1.ConditionalEffect.description: ConditionalEffect defines an effect that only runs if a condition is met.

tragedylooper.v1.DayCondition.title: Day Condition
tragedylooper.v1.DayCondition.description: DayCondition defines a condition based on the current day.

entry_location.title: Location Type
entry_location.description: 地点类型（也可通过LocationConfig扩展）

tragedylooper.v1.DelayedEntryEffect.title: Delayed Entry Effect
tragedylooper.v1.DelayedEntryEffect.description: DelayedEntryEffect defines an effect for a delayed entry.

move_character.description: Moves a character to a different location.

forbid.description: Forbids a character from performing an action.

grant_ability.description: Grants an ability to a character.

add_trait.description: Adds a trait to a character.

remove_trait.description: Removes a trait from a character.

tragedylooper.v1.Effect.title: Effect
tragedylooper.v1.Effect.description: Effect defines the specific action of an ability, card, or rule.

tragedylooper.v1.Empty.title: Empty
tragedylooper.v1.Empty.description: Empty is a placeholder for messages that have no data.

reason.description: The reason for the game ending.

tragedylooper.v1.EndGameEffect.title: End Game Effect
tragedylooper.v1.EndGameEffect.description: EndGameEffect defines an effect that ends the game.

event_type.title: Game Event Type
event_type.description: 游戏事件类型（用于能力触发器过滤）

lookback_days.description: How many days into the past to look. 0 means today, 1 means today and yesterday, etc.

event_target.description: Optional: Further filter by the character involved in the event.

count.description: The number of times the event must have occurred.

tragedylooper.v1.EventHistoryCondition.title: Event History Condition
tragedylooper.v1.EventHistoryCondition.description: EventHistoryCondition defines a condition based on past game events.

forbid_type.title: Forbid Type
forbid_type.description: The type of action to forbid.

tragedylooper.v1.ForbidEffect.title: Forbid Effect
tragedylooper.v1.ForbidEffect.description: ForbidEffect defines an effect that forbids an action.

ability_id.description: The ID of the ability to grant.

is_temporary.description: Whether the ability is temporary (e.g., lasts for one day or one loop).

tragedylooper.v1.GrantAbilityEffect.title: Grant Ability Effect
tragedylooper.v1.GrantAbilityEffect.description: GrantAbilityEffect defines an effect that grants an ability.

location.title: Location Type
location.description: 地点类型（也可通过LocationConfig扩展）

state.title: Location State
state.description: The state to check for the character at the location.

tragedylooper.v1.LocationCondition.title: Location Condition
tragedylooper.v1.LocationCondition.description: LocationCondition defines a condition based on a character's location.

destination.title: Location Type
destination.description: 地点类型（也可通过LocationConfig扩展）

tragedylooper.v1.MoveCharacterEffect.title: Move Character Effect
tragedylooper.v1.MoveCharacterEffect.description: MoveCharacterEffect defines an effect that moves a character.

tragedylooper.v1.PhaseCondition.title: Phase Condition
tragedylooper.v1.PhaseCondition.description: PhaseCondition defines a condition based on the current game phase.

tragedylooper.v1.PlayerCondition.title: Player Condition
tragedylooper.v1.PlayerCondition.description: PlayerCondition defines a condition based on a player's state.

guessed_roles.description: Guesses about character roles, keyed by character_id.

tragedylooper.v1.PlayerDeductionKnowledg.title: Player Deduction Knowledge
tragedylooper.v1.PlayerDeductionKnowledg.description: PlayerDeductionKnowledge holds the information and guesses a Protagonist player has made.

current_location.title: Location Type
current_location.description: 地点类型（也可通过LocationConfig扩展）

in_panic_mode.description: Whether the character is in panic.

tragedylooper.v1.PlayerViewCharacter.title: Player View Character
tragedylooper.v1.PlayerViewCharacter.description: PlayerViewCharacter is a sanitized version of a Character for client display. It omits hidden information like the true role (for opponents).

tragedylooper.v1.PlayerViewPlayer.title: Player View Player
tragedylooper.v1.PlayerViewPlayer.description: PlayerViewPlayer is a sanitized version of a Player for client display. It omits private information like the other player's hand.

tragedylooper.v1.RemoveTraitEffect.title: Remove Trait Effect
tragedylooper.v1.RemoveTraitEffect.description: RemoveTraitEffect defines an effect that removes a trait from a character.

tragedylooper.v1.RevealRoleEffect.title: Reveal Role Effect
tragedylooper.v1.RevealRoleEffect.description: RevealRoleEffect defines an effect that reveals a character's role.

has_role.description: Whether the character has the role (defaults to true).

tragedylooper.v1.RoleCondition.title: Role Condition
tragedylooper.v1.RoleCondition.description: RoleCondition defines a condition based on a character's role.

restricted_locations.title: Location Type
restricted_locations.description: 地点类型（也可通过LocationConfig扩展）

tragedylooper.v1.SpecialMovementRule.title: Special Movement Rule
tragedylooper.v1.SpecialMovementRule.description: SpecialMovementRule defines a special movement rule.

stat_type.title: Stat Type
stat_type.description: StatType defines the type of character stat.

target_to_compare.description: Optional: A second target to compare against. If set, the condition compares the stat of 'target' with the stat of 'target_to_compare'.

tragedylooper.v1.StatCondition.title: Stat Condition
tragedylooper.v1.StatCondition.description: StatCondition defines a condition based on a character's stats.

triggering_character.description: The character that triggered the event.

character_with_role_id.description: Any character with a specific role.

all_characters_at_location.title: Location Type
all_characters_at_location.description: 地点类型（也可通过LocationConfig扩展）

action_user.description: The user of the action (card or ability).

action_target.description: The target of the action (card or ability).

tragedylooper.v1.TargetSelector.title: Target Selector
tragedylooper.v1.TargetSelector.description: TargetSelector defines a dynamic target for conditions or effects. It uses a oneof to ensure that only one type of selector can be set at a time.

has_trait.description: Whether the character has the trait (defaults to true).

tragedylooper.v1.TraitCondition.title: Trait Condition
tragedylooper.v1.TraitCondition.description: TraitCondition defines a condition based on a character's traits.

incident_id.description: The ID of the incident to trigger (references an IncidentConfig in the ScriptConfig).

tragedylooper.v1.TriggerIncidentEffect.title: Trigger Incident Effect
tragedylooper.v1.TriggerIncidentEffect.description: TriggerIncidentEffect defines an effect that triggers an incident.

possible_locations.title: Location Type
possible_locations.description: 地点类型（也可通过LocationConfig扩展）

prompt.description: The prompt to show to the player.

tragedylooper.v1.TurfSelectionEffect.title: Turf Selection Effect
tragedylooper.v1.TurfSelectionEffect.description: TurfSelectionEffect defines an effect for selecting a turf.
